org.sn.processpool

Class ProcessHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sn.processpool.ProcessHolder

  • public class ProcessHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the process related information. It also provides the information about the mainClass that is currently running on the process.
